\uc77c\ub860 \uba38\uc2a4\ud06c.description: conversing about conversing about brainstorming ideas for the introduction of Leonardo's paper @ <persona> 레오나르도 다빈치
chat: 일론 머스크
Hey Leonardo! I noticed you're working on your paper. Do you need any help with brainstorming ideas for the introduction?
레오나르도 다빈치
Yes, actually. I'm struggling with coming up with a captivating hook for the introduction. Any suggestions?
일론 머스크
How about starting with an intriguing anecdote related to your research topic?
레오나르도 다빈치
That's a great suggestion, Elon! I think an intriguing anecdote would definitely grab the reader's attention. Do you have any specific ideas for an anecdote I can use?
일론 머스크
How about starting with a powerful quote that relates to your research topic?
레오나르도 다빈치
That's a great suggestion, Elon! I think starting with a powerful quote that relates to my research topic would be an excellent way to captivate the reader. Thank you for the suggestion!
일론 머스크
How about incorporating a thought-provoking question in the introduction? It can engage the reader and make them curious about your research.
레오나르도 다빈치
I like the idea of incorporating a thought-provoking question in the introduction. It can definitely engage the reader and make them curious about my research. Thanks for the suggestion, Elon!
일론 머스크
You're welcome, Leonardo! Let me know if you need any more help.
레오나르도 다빈치
Thank you, Elon! I will definitely keep your suggestions in mind. I really appreciate your help.
일론 머스크
You're welcome, Leonardo! Let me know if you need any more help.
레오나르도 다빈치
Thanks again, Elon! I will definitely reach out if I need any more help.
일론 머스크
I think it would also be effective to start with a surprising statistic or fact related to your research topic.
레오나르도 다빈치
I think incorporating a surprising statistic or fact related to my research topic would be a great idea too. Thank you for the suggestion, Elon!
일론 머스크
I think it would be helpful to start with a compelling story or anecdote that relates to your research topic. It can help to establish a personal connection with the reader.
레오나르도 다빈치
Thank you, Elon! I will definitely keep your suggestions in mind. I really appreciate your help.
